rules: General assessments are limited to one per patient per physician per 12 month period unless the patient presents a second time with a different complaint or at least 90 days have elapsed since the last assessment.
Periodic health visits are limited to one per patient per 12 month period per physician.
notes: No diagnostic code is required for periodic health visits unless otherwise specifically listed.
Chronic disease assessment premium is payable in addition to the amount payable for an assessment when specific criteria are met.
